roleset.name: change of state

example.name: all examples look like this
example.text: Plans that give advertisers discounts for maintaining orincreasing ad spending have become permanent fixtures at the newsweeklies and underscore the fierce competition between Newsweek, TimeWarner Inc.'s Time magazine, and Mortimer B. Zuckerman's U.S. News& World Report.
example.arg: Plans that give advertisers discounts for maintaining orincreasing ad spending

roleset.note: BECOME-V NOTES: Frames file for 'become' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from become.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: be attractive or well suited

role.descr: who or what it is become on/for?

example.name: ARG
example.text: A cap, an apron, or a handkerchief, which, I am told, looks hideous upon her, I always find is very becoming on any other of the family
example.arg: A cap, an apron, or a handkerchief, which, I am told, looks hideous upon her,
on any other of the family

roleset.note: BECOME-V NOTES: Frames file for 'become' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from become.02-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: auxiliary

example.name: became known (note that a trace follows the subsequent verb)
example.text: [They]-1 become known *trace*-1 as The Eight Great Outlaws.

example.name: again, note the trace after second verb. 'intertwined' is in a VP node
example.text: It is time to recognize that [the New York Stock Exchange , the futures markets and the options markets]-1 , though physically separate , have actually become so closely intertwined *trace*-1 as to constitute one market effectively .

example.name: Bork Bork Bork
example.text: One can understand Mr. Bork 's fear that [the new right to privacy]-1 will become intolerably stretched *trace*-1.

roleset.note: BECOME-V NOTES: Frames file for 'become' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from become.03-v predicate notes)
do not tag--no arguments! Remember-- aux usages will be followed by a VP node, rather than an NP or ADJ node. (from become.03-v)
